title: (x) Paperless is more... humanist sans - Agenda {Nicolai}
content:
…and then it wasn’t. Curse that kicky lowercase L, among other things.

Can someone identify this for me? It’s driving me bananas. It looks like it should be so easy.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612044131im_/http:/typophile.com/files/paperless_5749.gif)

Much appreciated!

 [‹ "Malkin" modern Arts & Crafts display sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612044131/http:/typophile.com/node/19675 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for Neutra Text ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612044131/http:/typophile.com/node/19559 "Go to next forum topic")
author: totopo

comments.content: thank ye kindly. now to get the client to pay for it.
